long_desc.thetext: I use a combobox inside a groupbox. When using setEnabled before adding the groupbox to the combobox, everything works finde, but using this function afterwards, I always get the error, that the function setEnabled does not exist. When checking the combobox at this point with firebug, i also cannot see this function inside the list. The functions getEnabled ans isEnabled still exists, but it is not possible to change this property, since toggleEnabled also uses the function setEnabled.
Could you attach a small example based on the skeleton of one of the examples in the demo browser, which demonstrates the bug? This way it is easier for us to fix your issue.

I tried to build a simple sample, but everytime i start to simplify my code and remove the requests the effect disappears. So it seams that it only happens in really special situations. If i can build an example without the specific backend I use, I will post it.
I have problems rebuilding this error, so i think something was wrong in my script, after rewriting it the bug disappears.
